text: @Liz_Cheney @realDonaldTrump was briefed. @VP was briefed. Just like American civilians are on their own with the #COVID19 pandemic, our troops are on their own with this scandal. #PutinsPuppet #TraitorInChief #ToolsOfPutin #ToolOfPutin
